description:
The Bank of England Governor today joined Britain's biggest retailers including Tesco, Asda and Sainsbury's warning that job cuts are "inevitable" after Rachel Reeves's tax-hiking Budget.

The post Bank of England Governor Joins Big Retailers in Warning of Job Losses and Price Rises After Labour Horror Budget appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Bank of England Governor Joins Big Retailers in Warning of Job Losses and Price Rises After Labour Horror Budget

description:
Labour's swivel-eyed Net Zero zealotry is getting more cult-like by the day, says Sallust – as two recent articles in the Daily Telegraph, one on a weird 19th century sect and one on COP29, make clear.

The post Labour’s Swivel-Eyed Net Zero Zealotry Gets More Cult-Like by the Day appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Labour’s Swivel-Eyed Net Zero Zealotry Gets More Cult-Like by the Day

description:
With a looming jobs bloodbath from Ed Miliband’s crusade to make Britain the global leader on climate change a civil war within Labour is about to break out over Net Zero, says Matthew Lynn.

The post Labour’s Coming Civil War Over Net Zero as Unions Face Jobs Bloodbath appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Labour’s Coming Civil War Over Net Zero as Unions Face Jobs Bloodbath

description:
A police raid on a pensioner for calling a Green Cabinet Minister a "moron" online has shone an overdue spotlight on Germany's repressive speech laws that ban insulting politicians, says Eugyppius.

The post Police Raid on Pensioner for Calling Green Cabinet Minister a “Moron” Shines Spotlight on Germany’s Repressive Speech Laws appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Police Raid on Pensioner for Calling Green Cabinet Minister a “Moron” Shines Spotlight on Germany’s Repressive Speech Laws

description:
Tory Shadow Ministers have demanded Rachel Reeves come clean following accusations the Chancellor lied on her CV, as No.10 refuses to say if she broke the ministerial code.

The post No. 10 Refuses to Say if Rachel Reeves Broke Ministerial Code as Chancellor Faces Demands to Come Clean in CV Deception Row appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: No. 10 Refuses to Say if Rachel Reeves Broke Ministerial Code as Chancellor Faces Demands to Come Clean in CV Deception Row

description:
Farmers have been told by Rachel Reeves that they must pay inheritance tax to fund the NHS, despite mass protests planned for today and warnings the tax's impact has been massively underestimated.

The post Farmers Must Pay Up for the NHS, Says Rachel Reeves appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Farmers Must Pay Up for the NHS, Says Rachel Reeves

description:
WHO chief Tedros Ghebreyesus has been trumpeting cancer vaccines this week, a move that Prof Angus Dalgleish sees as a smokescreen for its incompetence in Covid and the harms of the mRNA vaccines it can no longer hide.

The post The WHO’s Trumpeting of Cancer Vaccines is a Smokescreen appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: The WHO’s Trumpeting of Cancer Vaccines is a Smokescreen

description:
A summary of the most interesting stories in the past 24 hours that challenge the prevailing orthodoxy about the ‘climate emergency’, public health ‘crises’ and the supposed moral defects of Western civilisation.

The post News Round-Up appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: News Round-Up
